## Service.reject() method

reject request in flight

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reject(code: number, msg: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | number | http response code |
|  msg | string | message that should be displayed on the client |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
